<title level="1" right="Rules">[Initiative](/Rules.aspx?ID=3300)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At the start of an encounter, all creatures involved roll for initiative to determine the order in which they act. The higher the result of its roll, the earlier a creature gets to act. Initiative and combat are described in [Chapter 8](/Rules.aspx?ID=2421).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
